name: AlternativeButtons
description: For each behavior, you can decide wether to apply changes when the button is hovered, pressed or both.
-A behavior for sprites to change animations when hovered/pressed.
-A behavior for texts to enable the outline and/or the shadow when hovered/pressed.
-A behavior for sprites to enable an effect and/or change one of its properties when hovered/pressed.
-An object (advanced) with a sprite which changes animation when hovered/pressed and a BBtext over it.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Adds the button functionality to a Sprite. It needs an animation named "Idle".
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: SpriteButton

eventsFunctions.description: When the button is hovered.
eventsFunctions.name: Hovered

eventsFunctions.description: When the button is pressed.
eventsFunctions.name: Pressed

eventsFunctions.description: Check if hover ability is abled. Change animation if hovered, it needs an animation named "Hovered".
eventsFunctions.name: Hoverable

eventsFunctions.description: Change hover ability. Change animation if hovered, it needs an animation named "Hovered".
eventsFunctions.name: SetHoverable

eventsFunctions.description: Check if press abilityis abled. Change animation if pressed, it needs an animation named "Pressed".
eventsFunctions.name: Pressable

eventsFunctions.description: Change press ability. Change animation if pressed, it needs an animation named "Pressed".
eventsFunctions.name: SetPressable

propertyDescriptors.label: Hover ability
propertyDescriptors.description: Change animation if hovered, it needs an animation named "Hovered"
propertyDescriptors.name: Hoverable

propertyDescriptors.label: Press ability
propertyDescriptors.description: Change animation if pressed, it needs an animation named "Pressed"
propertyDescriptors.name: Pressable

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Adds the button functionality to the text object. You can choose to activate the outline or the shadow or both when the text is hovered or pressed.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: TextButton

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Adds the button functionality to a Sprite with an effect. When you choose the changes have to be applied (button hovered or pressed), it can activate and effect and/or modify one of its properties.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: EffectButton
